Layout/ArgumentAlignment.description:
Description

Align the arguments of a method call if they span more than one line.
Layout/ArgumentAlignment.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: with_first_argument (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['with_first_argument', 'with_fixed_indentation'] (type: list)
IndentationWidth: None (type: NoneType)
